title: Galust Petrosyan
text: Galust Petrosyan (, born on 5 September 1981 in <a href="Yerevan">Yerevan</a>, <a href="Armenian%20SSR">Armenian SSR</a>) is a retired <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>. He was a member of the <a href="Armenia%20national%20football%20team">Armenian national team</a>, with 7 caps and 1 goal scored.
